Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay!”

Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights anime evolution 2010 night ground level 2 bedroom suitea stones throw action didnt hear peep night clean nice comfortable housekeeping knocked 10 am werent ready leave ground level summer nice refreshingly cool nicely decorated comfortable beds bedding etc morning decided stay night lucky suite gage apartments main building bedroom comfy bedbedding pull livingroom ceiling fan bedroom flatscreen tv livingroom view clean tidy nicely furnished deal price staff starbucks coffee kitchen spotless bathroom deal considering hotels soooo am definitely staying highly recommend 1 bd gage apartments windows wide awesome breeze kids id recommend short storage space complete kitchens cutlery nice nicer expensive hotels ive stayed apartment basically price regular tiny hotel

Reviews.Title: “its the worst place to host any meeting”

Reviews.Content: attending medical conference ubc told stay gage tower hotel doesnt air called operator temp told fan closet window 245 night air conditioning pool told extra charge 6 person pool time size bathroom tub shower stood move bump walls staffs conference services nightmare attended meetings europe experience bad trip enjoyable maybe canadian nice friendly americans
